Title: DEI boycott 'played a role' in Target's Q1 sales slump as foot traffic declined
Body:
In This Article:
Target's (TGT) sluggish first quarter was partly due to consumers' protests to the retail giant's rollback on diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) policies.
On Wednesday, shares of the retailer slid more than 7% after it posted a 3.8% year-over-year decline in same-store sales,…
